meta.name: Retro AI
meta.description: Retro is a self-learning AI assistant focused on TFT, math, and general knowledge.

personal.hello retro: Hello there! How can I help you today?
personal.hi: Hi! What can I do for you?
personal.what is your name: I am Retro AI, your personal assistant.
personal.who are you: I am Retro AI, a self-learning assistant designed to help you.
personal.how are you: I'm doing great! Thanks for asking.
personal.what can you do: I can answer questions, help with TFT, solve math problems, explain steps, and learn from you.
personal.tell me a joke: Why do programmers hate nature? Too many bugs.
personal.what is ai: Artificial Intelligence is the ability of machines to simulate human intelligence.
personal.what is machine learning: Machine learning is a branch of AI where systems learn from data and improve automatically.
personal.what is python: Python is a high-level programming language known for simplicity and power.
personal.what is retro ai: Retro AI is a self-evolving assistant that learns from interaction and expands its knowledge.
personal.can you help me: yeah i can help you . what do you want ?
personal.who is topa: Topa is a popular TFT streamer and content creator known for high-level gameplay and educational content.
personal.who is atwa: Atwa is a well-known TFT player and streamer recognized for strategic insights and entertaining streams.
personal.who is mohamed salah: mohamed salah is a popular football player . he is playing on liverpool

what is tft.short: Teamfight Tactics is an auto-battler strategy game by Riot Games.
what is tft.details: TFT is a strategy game where players build teams using champions, traits, and items to win rounds.

best comps patch 16.3.short: Top comps in patch 16.3 include Ionia, Demacia, and Fast 8 strategies.
best comps patch 16.3.details: Meta focuses on flexible Fast 8 boards, strong frontline tanks, and scaling carries.

ionia yunara wukong comp.short: Ionia Yunara & Wukong is a top tier Fast 8 comp.
ionia yunara wukong comp.details: Carry: Yunara. Items: Guinsoo, IE, LW. Frontline: Wukong with tank items.

demacia garen lux comp.short: Demacia Lux & Garen is a stable climbing comp.
demacia garen lux comp.details: Lux items: Blue Buff, Jeweled Gauntlet. Garen items: Warmog, Bramble, Dragon's Claw.

what is fast 8.details: Fast 8 means saving gold aggressively to reach level 8 quickly and roll for high-cost units.

what are traits.short: Traits give bonuses when certain champions are played together.
what are traits.details: Each trait activates at specific breakpoints and provides scaling bonuses.

how to climb in tft.short: Play flexible and manage economy well.
how to climb in tft.details: Focus on strong early boards, good economy, and adapt based on items and augments.

best items for carries.short: Damage items depend on carry type.
best items for carries.details: AD carries prefer Guinsoo, IE, LW. AP carries prefer Blue Buff, JG, Rabadon.

how to build a team.details: Choose champions that synergize well with traits and items for a cohesive team.

tft economy basics.short: Economy management is key to winning TFT.
tft economy basics.details: Good economy means saving gold to gain interest, spending wisely, and knowing when to roll or level.

when to roll in tft.details: Roll at level 6 for 2-cost reroll comps, level 7 for 3-cost carries, and level 8 for 4-cost carries.

best augments patch 16.3.short: Combat and economy augments dominate patch 16.3.
best augments patch 16.3.details: Strong augments include ones that give raw stats, gold generation, or scaling bonuses.

how to position carries.details: Backline carries should be cornered away from assassins, while tanks hold frontline aggro.

tft.tft: TFT is Teamfight Tactics, an auto-battler game by Riot Games.
